verses.verse: <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign<s%>, and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337%H6240>sixteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: but he <S%H6213>did<s%> not that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, like <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>:
For he walked <S%H3212>in<s%> the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> also molten <S%H4541>images<s%> for <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>.

Moreover he burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom<s%>, and <S%H1197>burnt<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%>, after the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> whom the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
He <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> also and burnt <S%H6999>incense<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places<s%>, and on the <S%H1389>hills<s%>, and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>.

Wherefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>; and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> a great <S%H1419>multitude<s%> of them <S%H7633>captives<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>. And he was also <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H5221>smote<s%> him with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>.

¶ For <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%> <S%H2026>slew<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, which were all <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%>; because they had <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H2147>Zichri<s%>, a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5840>Azrikam<s%> the <S%H5057>governor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> that was <S%H4932>next<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, <S%H802>women<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and took also <S%H962>away<s%> <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> from them, and <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

But a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was there, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H5752>Oded<s%>: and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Behold, because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> was <S%H2534>wroth<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, he hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and ye have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them in a <S%H2197>rage<s%> that reacheth <S%H5060>up<s%> unto <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And now ye <S%H559>purpose<s%> to keep <S%H3533>under<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5650>bondmen<s%> and <S%H8198>bondwomen<s%> unto you: but are there not with you, <S%H7535>even<s%> with you, <S%H819>sins<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>?

Now <S%H8085>hear<s%> me therefore, and <S%H7725>deliver<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> again, which ye have taken <S%H7617>captive<s%> of your <S%H251>brethren<s%>: for the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is upon you.

Then <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H5838>Azariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3076>Johanan<s%>, <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4919>Meshillemoth<s%>, and <S%H3169>Jehizkiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, and <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2311>Hadlai<s%>, stood <S%H6965>up<s%> against them that <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H6635>war<s%>,

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye shall not bring <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> hither: for whereas we have <S%H819>offended<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> already, ye <S%H559>intend<s%> to <S%H3254>add<s%> more to our <S%H2403>sins<s%> and to our <S%H819>trespass<s%>: for our <S%H819>trespass<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>, and there is <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
So the armed <S%H2502>men<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%> and the <S%H961>spoil<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> and all the <S%H6951>congregation<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> which were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H2388>took<s%> the <S%H7633>captives<s%>, and with the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> all that were <S%H4636>naked<s%> among them, and <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> them, and <S%H5274>shod<s%> them, and gave them to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8248>drink<s%>, and <S%H5480>anointed<s%> them, and <S%H5095>carried<s%> all the <S%H3782>feeble<s%> of them upon <S%H2543>asses<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558%H5899>trees<s%>, <S%H681>to<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>: then they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.
¶ At that <S%H6256>time<s%> did <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> unto the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> him.
For again the <S%H130>Edomites<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>smitten<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and carried <S%H7617>away<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%>.

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also had <S%H6584>invaded<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the low <S%H8219>country<s%>, and of the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and had <S%H3920>taken<s%> <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, and <S%H357>Ajalon<s%>, and <S%H1450>Gederoth<s%>, and <S%H7755>Shocho<s%> with the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, and <S%H8553>Timnah<s%> with the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof, <S%H1579>Gimzo<s%> also and the <S%H1323>villages<s%> thereof: and they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> there.

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3665>brought<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3665>low<s%> because of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for he <S%H6544>made<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6544>naked<s%>, and <S%H4603>transgressed<s%> <S%H4604>sore<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And <S%H8407>Tilgath-pilneser<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> unto him, and <S%H6696>distressed<s%> him, but <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> him not.

For <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> took away a <S%H2505>portion<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and of the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>: but he <S%H5833>helped<s%> him not.
¶ And in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of his <S%H6887>distress<s%> did he <S%H4603>trespass<s%> yet <S%H3254>more<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: this is that <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>.

For he <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, which <S%H5221>smote<s%> him: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Because the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H5826>help<s%> them, therefore will I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to them, that they may <S%H5826>help<s%> me. But they were the <S%H3782>ruin<s%> of him, and of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and cut in <S%H7112>pieces<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and shut <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and he <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H4196>altars<s%> in every <S%H6438>corner<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And in every several <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> high <S%H1116>places<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and provoked to <S%H3707>anger<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of his <S%H1697>acts<s%> and of all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last<s%>, behold, they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: but they <S%H935>brought<s%> him not into the <S%H6913>sepulchres<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his stead.
